subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant scored 30 points, and Pau Gasol added 27 points as the Los Angeles Lakers stopped the host Dallas Mavericks’ four-game winning streak with a 109-93 victory Wednesday night.
snippet: Kobe Bryant scored 30 points, and Pau Gasol added 27 points as the Los Angeles Lakers stopped the host Dallas Mavericks’ four-game winning streak with a 109-93 victory Wednesday night.
